titles.title: SF538 Now through the grace of God we claim

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Now through the grace of God we claim
this life to be Christ's own,
baptized with water in the name
of Father, Spirit, Son.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For Jesus Christ the crucified,
who broke the power of sin,
now lives to plead for those baptized
in unity with him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So let us act upon his word,
rejoicing in our faith,
until we rise with Christ our Lord
and triumph over death!
